name: FPS PROTOTYPE (caspar1500)
description:
This is a first person shooter game.

Its still in early stages and this is a prototype release.
If you have any idea's that you would like to have added into the game please comment them down below

Controls:
WASD = Move
SPACE = Jump
SHIFT = Run
R = Reload
G = Throw grenade
MOUSE MOVE = Aim
MOUSE BUTTON 1 = Shoot
